_description: Configuration for cyclic peptide sequence design (fixed backbone)

input.positions_explanation: Positions to design (e.g., '1-5,10,15-20') or null for all

structure_constraints.rg_explanation: Radius of gyration constraint for compact structures

alphafold.recycle_explanation: AF2 recycles for better structure prediction (0 for speed)

loss_weights.weights_explanation: dgram_cce: distance prediction, fape: frame aligned error, plddt: confidence, pae: alignment error

full_design.description: Design all positions in the peptide

partial_design.description: Design specific regions while keeping others fixed

single_position.description: Design only one position for point mutations
